title.narrative: Support towards a Mine Impact Free Sri Lanka by 2020

description.narrative: The goal of this continuation of the grant will be to support the Government of Sri Lanka in achieving mine impact free status by 2020. This will be achieved through two objectives: 1) To assist in the clearance of up to 20%2 of remaining registered IMSMA CHAs in Mannar District, northern Sri Lanka. and 2) To complete the clearance of all registered IMSMA CHAs in Trincomalee district and commence clearance in Mullaithivu district. MAG will deploy eight Mine Action Teams (MATs), four Mechanical Support Teams (MSTs), five Casualty Evacuation Teams (CETs), and two Community Liaison Teams (CLTs) across the north and east of Sri Lanka. These teams will undertake technical survey and clearance leading to the release of 604,000m2 of land during the proposed project period. MAG projects that within the first six months of this option year, a second mine affected district, Trincomalee, will also be declared at residual risk by the GoSL.

sector.narrative: Conflict Prevention and Resolution/Peace and Security
